title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting "Add Javadoc" from the context menu on a field in TH, nothing happens.
EB: The action of selecting "Add Javadoc" should add Javadoc on the field.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Open the software and navigate to the TH module.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. Select "Add Javadoc" from the context menu.
4. Observe that nothing happens.
